casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne JOHNSON. No. 14P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Robert W. Johnson, Marion, for Johnson, Robert W. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Tom Florner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of January 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
